ComicInfo.Title: Glitz to Go; A Warning from Peter Bagge; I Remember the Sixties; Deep Thoughts from My Kitchen; Cleanliness is Next to Dogliness!!; Big City; 4 Red Brides; The Schlep Set

ComicInfo.Summary:
Rundown of assorted fashions
Bagge repents for his editorial stint
Mode is offered a bit part in a film. She then hosts an "intimate gathering" to celebrate this.
Childhood recollections of Texas
Aline's daily routine
Life with Tona
Big Bitch steals the formula for Coke.
The dangers of the city
How art became an escape
A trip to France
